featureType.name: event_full
featureType.title: event_full
featureType.abstract: event locations with full information about region and group
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: event_full
virtualTable.sql: select event.id as id, event.the_geom, event.type, event.month, event.region_name, region.population as region_population, region.group_name from newyork.event event full join newyork.region region on event.region_name = region.name
